detail_desc: Leggings in sturdy jersey made from an organic cotton blend with an elasticated waist. Soft brushed inside.
Thin top in sweatshirt fabric with long raglan sleeves and a faux fur front with embroidery and applications. Slightly longer at the back.
Ankle boots in imitation leather with decorative seams, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 2.5 cm.
Hat in a soft, fine knit with a turn-up with an eye mask that can be folded down.
Sunglasses with wood-patterned plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Sunglasses with metal frames and UV-protective, mirrored lenses.
Sunglasses with metal frames and UV-protective, mirrored lenses.

Lightly padded bomber jacket with a detachable, lined jersey hood. Ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front, flap front pockets with a concealed press-stud, zipped sleeve pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Wide top in soft, ribbed jersey with short sleeves with overlocked edges and an overlocked hem.
Wide top in soft, ribbed jersey with short sleeves with overlocked edges and an overlocked hem.
Long, airy top in soft jersey with long sleeves, visible seams and an asymmetric cut to the raw-edge hem. Longer at the back.
Long, airy top in soft jersey with long sleeves, visible seams and an asymmetric cut to the raw-edge hem. Longer at the back.
Long, airy top in soft jersey with long sleeves, visible seams and an asymmetric cut to the raw-edge hem. Longer at the back.
Long, airy top in soft jersey with long sleeves, visible seams and an asymmetric cut to the raw-edge hem. Longer at the back.
Short top in stretch jersey with dropped shoulders, short sleeves and a decorative seam front and back.
Tops in soft stretch fabric with narrow adjustable shoulder straps. Soft integral top with a functional fastening for easier nursing access and an elasticated hem. Seamless.
Straight-cut, knee-length dress in pleated jersey with a metallic print. Unlined.
Sleeveless satin shirt dress with a collar, buttons down the front, drawstring at the waist that is pulled from the sides and a rounded hem. Unlined.
Sleeveless satin shirt dress with a collar, buttons down the front, drawstring at the waist that is pulled from the sides and a rounded hem. Unlined.
Oversized top in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Oversized top in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Oversized top in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Oversized top in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Oversized top in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with dropped shoulders and long sleeves.

Sleeveless dress in a crêpe weave with a lace-covered back in a narrow cut at the top with short, narrow shoulder straps and buttons at the back. Elasticated seam at the waist and gently flared skirt. Lined at the top.
Short jersey dress in a double layer at the top with narrow shoulder straps and a wide flounce. Elasticated seam at the waist. Unlined.
Short jersey dress in a double layer at the top with narrow shoulder straps and a wide flounce. Elasticated seam at the waist. Unlined.
Double-layered hat in jersey with a print motif on the front.
Shaping. 5-pocket jeans in washed denim with technical stretch that holds in and shapes the tummy, thighs and seat while keeping the jeans in shape. High waist and skinny legs.
Shaping. 5-pocket jeans in washed denim with technical stretch that holds in and shapes the tummy, thighs and seat while keeping the jeans in shape. High waist and skinny legs.
Shaping. 5-pocket jeans in washed denim with technical stretch that holds in and shapes the tummy, thighs and seat while keeping the jeans in shape. High waist and skinny legs.
Shaping. 5-pocket jeans in washed denim with technical stretch that holds in and shapes the tummy, thighs and seat while keeping the jeans in shape. High waist and skinny legs.
Shaping. 5-pocket jeans in washed denim with technical stretch that holds in and shapes the tummy, thighs and seat while keeping the jeans in shape. High waist and skinny legs.

One-button jacket in a cotton velvet with narrow notch lapels, a chest pocket, flap front pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Paisley-patterned lining. Slim fit that tapers at the chest and waist, which combined with slightly narrower sleeves creates a fitted silhouette.

Single-breasted tuxedo jacket in a wool weave with satin details. Covered linked button at the front, a chest pocket, jetted front pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. Decorative button at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Skinny fit – a slightly shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves creates a completely fitted silhouette.
Hat in a double layer of marled, cotton-blend jersey.
Straight-cut dress in a textured weave with narrow double shoulder straps with one pair that cross at the back. Unlined.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft jacquard knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Knee-length dress in jersey with a print motif, V-neck and contrasting colour ribbing around the neckline and armholes. Pleated, flounced hem. Unlined.
Short skirt with a concealed zip in the side. Lined.
Short skirt with a concealed zip in the side. Lined.
Glittery ribbon chokers with a fastener at the back. Width approx. 1 cm. Adjustable length, 30-37 cm.
